welcome_message_body: Welcome to Ypsilanti, a charming city known for its historic architecture and vibrant arts scene. We hope you'll take the time to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer. Welcome to Ypsilanti!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: McNamara Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County Airport, serving most domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County Airport, primarily serving low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pontiac Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Pontiac Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.
